plot: On October 1997 the Danish Minister for the Interior Birte Weiss was forced to resign. This documentary explores the dilemma of dutifulness and the search for the fate of Bosnian refugees.
title: En minister krydser sit spor
plot_es: On October 1997 the Danish Minister for the Interior Birte Weiss was forced to resign. This documentary explores the dilemma of dutifulness and the search for the fate of Bosnian refugees.
plot_en: On October 1997 the Danish Minister for the Interior Birte Weiss was forced to resign. This documentary explores the dilemma of dutifulness and the search for the fate of Bosnian refugees.

cast.role: Herself - Former Minister for the Interior
cast.name: Birthe Weiss
